attributes.action: Allowing Trade deals with the Turkish Cypriot government of Northern (TRNC)
attributes.additional_details:
There is a lot of potential for the Northern Part of Cyprus to be taken into account.e.g. Agriculture, tourism, manufacturing are areas that can be tapped into.  
Facilitating talks to end the stale mate conditions is required.
attributes.background: Starting negotiations with the Turkish Cypriot government of Northern Cyprus (TRNC) will greatly benefit both the United Kingdom and the TRNC.  NEW trade deals will be formed with the most beautiful country of Cyprus.  This will allow access to the beautiful northern part of Cyprus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/584652

In order to seek trade deals with the Turkish Republic of Northern Cyprus (TRNC) the Government would need to officially recognise the TRNC as an independent country.
